Reviews.Title: You get what you pay.
Reviews.Author: tosht
Reviews.Content: For the price these are 2 average practice lenses but not suitable for outstanding results:Used with a Rebel T3i and 15/55 and 55/250 lenses these are rough results:Telephoto: It's not definitely a 2.2x, it just increases a little the zoom of lenses with frequent problems with autofocus, blurs and reflections and heavy vignetting when zooming out a little.Wide angle: A very small effect that doesn't exceed a quick adjustment in editing. Almost useless.Macro: Ok, for the price, decent results but don't expect to capture bugs detailsUV filter: Very goodCloth: ExcellentAveragely a low level product, affordable for the price. If you are looking for satisfying results, save the money for other (pricey) lenses. If you just want add limited option to your normal lenses they are ok.

Reviews.Title: 1 of 2.2x Telephoto and 0.43x Wide Angle High Definition Lenses + 58mm Ultra Violet (UV) Filter for CANON REBEL (T5i T4i T3i T3
Reviews.Author: David Templonuevo
Reviews.Content: Expected arrival Sep 6, but arrived August 29! Very prompt and the items are as promised.I've tried it the minute they were out of the box.  Both fit into my Canon Rebel EOST4i and both took pictures I have imagined it would.  The wide angle High Definition and the Telephoto lenses worked well for me, a newbie.  I understand it is not the high end but the price and results are great!I'm so happy. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Paul  M "Happy travel couple"
Reviews.Content: Product arrived early, and as ordered. These lenses will allow me to get a little close  for close-ups, and will enhance my telephoto lens.

Reviews.Title: Lens 58MM
Reviews.Author: Patrick J. Smith "Boots"
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a great addition for a great price this is the one to buy. It fullfilled my expections and would recommend it anyone who likes to tinker with different lens and not settle for the standard ones that come with a digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Lens won't work
Reviews.Author: JOHN BOBKO
Reviews.Content: Does not fit my camera. Was told it fits but it  is for a diffrent type of camera. Needed to fit canon SLR digital camera rebel"

Reviews.Title: It gets the job done!
Reviews.Author: Agustin quiles
Reviews.Content: The end part of the lense exterior cover appears when taking shots. It gives my shots a round shape screen view instead of a normal view. Just be aware of the round screen shape if you are using it to take the best wide angle shot. You can get rid off it by refocusing. Aside from that, it does gives me a good wide angle view... The delivery was on time.

Reviews.Title: LVT
Reviews.Author: L. J. Campbell "vtech"
Reviews.Content: This lens was what I thought to be a good alternative to an expensive lens. Do yourself a favor and save money to buy a good canon lens.

Reviews.Title: okay, but not great
Reviews.Author: Mary Atherton
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a 2X and a wide angle and this seemed like a good deal.  While I normally have been a fan of Vivatar products in the past, I'm not a big fan of these lenses.  I'll probably end up spending a lot more for something that will work better on my Canon t3.  I think the Canon lenses are better.

Reviews.Title: Nice quality !!! Well made!!!
Reviews.Author: Tiki Sam
Reviews.Content: The lenses showed up very fast well packed no damage Product is as shown nice quality well made one thing that was not mentioned is the lenses come in real nice draw string black leather like bags and the filter is nice also cant beat it for the price!!!

Reviews.Title: Canon t3i
Reviews.Author: Jcook
Reviews.Content: The lense are great items to add to my camera bag I have had a good time learning about the 2.2x lense great to attach to a long zoom for even fairther reach . Great buy

Reviews.Title: Like the Lenses and the service from Goja was excellent.
Reviews.Author: Art, Book and 3D Nerd
Reviews.Content: Products arrived fast and in good condition. Would buy from Goja again.If you are looking to buy a filter to protect these lenses or for effects, one of the lenses uses a 62mm and the other a 75mm.  This information was not apparent until I received the lenses.

Reviews.Title: nice item turns your lens into a wide angle lens.
Reviews.Author: Cly J. White
Reviews.Content: Its just as described. Turns my zoom lens into a wide angle lens. If your like me andlive your camera, and can't afford a separate lens for everything this is a nice add on.

Reviews.Title: Very cool lens
Reviews.Author: Carolyn
Reviews.Content: Loves the new lens. Comes in handy for special pictures. Just what he wanted, he pretty happy with them and will use them a lot

Reviews.Title: Great lenses.
Reviews.Author: Tech Gear Guru
Reviews.Content: This lens kit is a great addition to my photography kit and takes great pictures. I like the wide angle lens effect, great for creative shooting.

Reviews.Title: Define 2.2x
Reviews.Author: Mike Elias
Reviews.Content: I have purchased extenders for previous camera's and when they said 2x, it doubled your length of zoom (or vise-verse for wide angle); both of these were so negligible, I had to look over and over again to see if there was any difference at all. Seemed like decent quality for the price, but does not get the job done.

Reviews.Title: Good product and good service.
Reviews.Author: Pecos Bill
Reviews.Content: The lens arrived as expected and I am totally satisfied with them. The filter is super. would reccomend these items to anyone.

Reviews.Title: camera lens received promptly
Reviews.Author: Constance J. Russell
Reviews.Content: My granddaughter was very pleased with the gift.  She said it was everything she hoped it would be.  It works very well with her camera.
